org.hkijena.acaq5.api.data.traits

Class ACAQDefaultMutableTraitConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.acaq5.api.data.traits.ACAQDefaultMutableTraitConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ACAQMutableTraitConfiguration, ACAQTraitConfiguration

    public class ACAQDefaultMutableTraitConfiguration
extends Object
implements ACAQMutableTraitConfiguration
    The default ACAQTraitConfiguration. It transfers traits from input slots, to output slots. During this transfer, traits can be added or removed.
